industry: House Jorasco has a large house of healing in the ward
House Deneith has a recruiting station for would-be mercenaries
guilds: An adventurer’s guild — though the Deathsgate Guild has a dark reputation, and its members often pick fights with Clifftop adventurers

districts.description: Has deep roots in Karrnathi culture that predate the Last War

shops: Slogar’s and The Bloody Mug are places where you can find blood sausage and Nightwood ale
Tavick’s Market - one of Sharn’s main market districts with local produce and goods
entertainment: The Cornerstone - a massive arena that hosts everything from circuses to aerial jousting
An official court for Shifter sport, hrazhak
